text: Barrington is suburban village in Cook County and Lake County, Illinois, United States. The population was 10,722 at the 2020 census. It is northwest of Chicago. The Barrington area ZIP code, 60010, is the seventh-richest ZIP code in the United States. Barrington is part of the Chicago metropolitan area. ==References== Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois
title: Barrington, Illinois
